pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the feasibility of a novel multiparametric MRI (mpMRI) and cognitive fusion transperineal targeted biopsy (MRTB) led prostate cancer (PCa) diagnostic service with regard to cancer detection and reducing time to diagnosis and treatment.

metaData.source:
Is an extended 20-core prostate biopsy protocol more efficient than the standard 12-core? A randomized multicenter trial
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23313205/
